services.title: how I help businesses and entrepreneurs
services.description: I unlock the potential of businesses and entrepreneurs. Here's how:

development.title: app & web development
development.shortDescription: I transform your idea into an exceptional digital product.
development.description: I transform your idea into an exceptional digital product. From concept to implementation, we work together to create an impeccable and functional product.

productGrowth.title: product & growth advisory
productGrowth.shortDescription: I take your product to millions of users.
productGrowth.description: through in-depth analysis, growth strategies and product improvements, I'll guide you to maximize the adoption, engagement and value of your product in the market

fractionalCTO.title: fractional cto
fractionalCTO.shortDescription: I manage your product's technical challenges.
fractionalCTO.description: I'll work closely with you and your team to define the technical vision, plan product development and manage technical challenges.

devvMax.title: devv max
devvMax.description: an interactive platform to learn programming concepts through hands-on practice.

devv30.title: devv 30
devv30.description: 30-day challenges to learn programming. directly from your phone.

programmatoreLeg.title: legendary programmer
programmatoreLeg.description: the best Italian video course to learn programming, at the cost of a dinner.

tcl.title: tech career launch
tcl.description: a 1-on-1 mentorship to prepare for interviews and land your first job.

tcb.title: tech career boost
tcb.description: a 1-on-1 mentorship for programmers who want to make a career leap.

testimonials.name: Simone Bresciani
testimonials.title: ceo & founder @ teachcorner
testimonials.text: I had the opportunity and fortune to collaborate with Matteo in developing tools useful for my company. Matteo is very knowledgeable and helpful, and not only listens to the client's needs but truly gets involved in the project with advice, insights, and improvements that are very useful for growth and development. Thank you for the professionalism and availability always shown to us

testimonials.name: Andriy Klitsuk
testimonials.title: senior software engineer @ banca sella
testimonials.text: Matteo has an impressive ability to see the goal clearly and dodge everything that is superfluous. I'm very grateful that our paths crossed, working with him has contributed to my personal and professional growth

testimonials.name: Cris Pintea
testimonials.title: founder @ uptimeline
testimonials.text: If I had to entrust my company to someone, I would entrust it to Matteo.

testimonials.name: Gianluca Di Donato
testimonials.title: ceo @ utravel
testimonials.text: Matteo has been supporting us as Tech Advisor since 2023. He managed to launch the Utravel app and the new e-commerce site in less than a year. He programmed the roadmap and built a hybrid development team with both employees and external collaborators. He has the ability to take charge of a problem and solve it quickly in the best possible way. He embraces the projects he follows and experiences them as an internal team member!

testimonials.name: Simone Scarzella
testimonials.title: coo & founder @ accessiway
testimonials.text: I was fortunate to meet Matteo at WeStudents, collaborating daily for almost 2 years. I can say I found a deeply competent and passionate person, with a set of cross-functional skills that allows him to analyze and execute any project from all angles. The mix of creativity and logic makes his value extraordinary, not only professionally but also humanly.

testimonials.name: Luigi Cervesi
testimonials.title: founder @ lilium agency
testimonials.text: Working with Matteo is an immense pleasure. He manages to convey his knowledge making it tangible even to those who don't directly touch his areas of expertise. What I liked most about collaborating with Matteo is perceiving the passion, not only for what concerns him but for the success of a project as a whole.

blog.title: articles
blog.description: a remote corner of the web that I can fill with articles, stories and guides. Who reads blogs in 2026 anyway?
blog.extendedDescription: writing has always been a passion. when I code, I write code. when I'm not coding, I write articles. so basically I'm always writing.

services.title: services
services.description: explore the services I offer for businesses and entrepreneurs. I want to provide the necessary direction to help entrepreneurs achieve any kind of success
services.pageDescription: I've been fortunate to meet brilliant entrepreneurs with great ideas. But they all lacked one thing: the technological knowledge needed to unlock their full potential. I want to provide the necessary direction to help entrepreneurs achieve any kind of success.

contacts.title: how to contact me
contacts.description: whether you want to get to know me, talk about a project or collaboration, write to me. Something beautiful always comes from a message.

projects.title: projects
projects.description: explore the projects I've built in the past. Some projects were born from a personal need, while others are the result of collaborations with brilliant entrepreneurs motivated to turn ideas into reality.
projects.pageDescription: explore the projects I've built in the past. Some projects were born from a personal need, while others are the result of collaborations with brilliant entrepreneurs motivated to turn ideas into reality. Each project was guided by the same desire to overcome challenges and achieve extraordinary results.
